Headline: Midway-Bound Orange Line trains bypassing Halsted
ShortDescription: Midway-Bound Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-Bound Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Halsted due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available from Ashland to State/Lake provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
